document: <sentence id="s1" text="We confirmed previous studies showing that tumor necrosis factor alpha (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-α) induced reactivation of infectious virus, and by analyzing expression of the progenitor cell marker CD34 as well as myeloid cell differentiation markers in IE+ cells after treatment with TNF-α, we showed that TNF-α induced transcriptional reactivation of IE gene expression independently of differentiation.">
